svg.content: <mxfile modified="2019-01-26T12:40:49.683Z" host="www.draw.io" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/12.0.2 Safari/605.1.15" version="10.1.4" etag="rSBjgLZZKI2ulNXsZV63" type="google"><diagram id="PhZbR2o3FwCLukMl9H7F"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 205px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Does the apprentice have at least Level 2 English and maths?

p.span: This is the same as grade E or 2** at GCSE.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Do the apprenticeâ€™s English and maths qualifications meet the standard or framework of their apprenticeship?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Does the apprentice have a special educational need, learning difficulty or disability?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Will the apprentice be able to get the minimum requirement in English and maths?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Does the apprentice have at least approved Level 1 English and maths?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Is the apprentice working below Level 1?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 193px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: They do not need to do any more English or maths training.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 193px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: They must also do Level 2 English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 198px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: Weâ€™ll fund functional English and maths Level 2 for the apprentice.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 193px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: They must get at least entry Level 3 functional English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 193px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: They must get the minimum required standards in English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 198px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: They must do Level 2 English and maths (which weâ€™ll fund). If they cannot achieve this, they must get Level 1 English and maths (which we will not fund).

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 19px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 198px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

span.span: They must get Level 1 and 2 in English and maths. We may fund these qualifications, based on an assessment of the apprentice.
